chunks.text: So the question is, you are given 12 video files.

chunks.text: Okay, 12 files, 6 audio and 6 video.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.text: So what you have to do is that you are given 12 files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: 1.mp3, 2.mp3, all the way till 6.mp3.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So these are your MP3 files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Then you have 1.mp4, 2.mp4, all the way till 6.mp4.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And what happens if you do the control forward slash?

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: That you can comment or uncomment.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So if you will do the control forward slash, then look at this.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Thank you so much for watching this video.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And I will see you next time.
